mapper.select: SELECT sys_menu.sid, sys_menu.attr1 as sname, sys_menu.attr5 as className, sys_menu.code as url FROM sys_user_role right JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.attr30 = 1 and sys_menu.sid = sys_user_role.attr2 and sys_menu.attr3 = #{attr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sys_user_role.attr30 = 1 and sys_user_role.attr1 = #{attr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sys_menu.attr2 ASC

select * from ${tableName} where attr30 = 1 and (attr17 is null or attr17 = '')
and ( attr1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr6 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr7 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr8 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr9 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr10 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr11 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr12 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr13 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr14 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr15 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr16 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr17 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr18 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr19 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr20 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr21 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr22 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr23 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr24 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr25 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr26 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr27 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr28 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or attr29 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') )
ORDER BY updateDate DESC

insert.foreach: insert into student (sid, attr1, attr2, attr3, attr4, attr5, attr6, attr7, attr8, attr9, attr10, attr11, attr12, attr13, attr14, attr15, attr16, attr17, attr18, attr19, attr20, attr21, attr28, attr29, attr30, createBy, createDate, updateBy, updateDate) values (null,#{item.name},#{item.sex},#{item.address},#{item.telephone},#{item.tId})
